class.name: wxTreebook
class.description:
This class is an extension of the wxNotebook class that allows a tree structured set of pages to be shown in a control.

A classic example is a netscape preferences dialog that shows a tree of preference sections on the left and select section page on the right.

To use the class simply create it and populate with pages using InsertPage(), InsertSubPage(), AddPage(), AddSubPage().

If your tree is no more than 1 level in depth then you could simply use AddPage() and AddSubPage() to sequentially populate your tree by adding at every step a page or a subpage to the end of the tree.

type.name: wxEVT_COMMAND_TREEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGING
type.description: The page selection is about to be changed. This event can be vetoed (using wxNotifyEvent::Veto()).

type.name: wxEVT_COMMAND_TREEBOOK_NODE_COLLAPSED
type.description: The page node is going to be collapsed.

type.name: wxEVT_COMMAND_TREEBOOK_NODE_EXPANDED
type.description: The page node is going to be expanded.

bitmap.label: Bitmap
bitmap.description: Bitmap shown alongside the label (default: none).

int.name: image
int.label: Image index
int.description: The zero-based index of the image associated with the item into the image list.

bool.name: selected
bool.label: Selected
bool.description: Is the page selected initially (only one page can be selected; default: 0)?

bool.name: expanded
bool.label: Expanded
bool.description: If set to 1, the page is initially expanded. By default all pages are initially collapsed.

int.name: depth
int.label: Depth
int.description: Page's depth in the labels tree.
